ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 267
ygData.msgSnippet: It s easy to spot.  Kill shadow men that are carring what looks like an ice cream cone.  The stone that I have gotten for both me and others have all come off
ygData.messageBody:
It's easy to spot. Kill shadow men that are carring what looks like an ice
cream cone. The stone that I have gotten for both me and others have all
come off them. And ever time I've seen one that has that, it dropped.


Previous Posts:
And shadow men will drop it... its not very common though I dont think, it
took me a while of killing them before I found it.

Cogg
----- Original Message -----
From: <eqcariel@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, March 31, 2000 5:59 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Rod of Insidious Glamour


> Does anyone know if the shining stone we need for this quest comes from
any
> Shadowed Men? Or is there a specific group of them that tend to drop
this
> stone?
>
> Cariel Kalyn
